roleset.name: to make smooth, polish
roleset.note: BURNISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'burnish' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from burnish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yet his co-defendant in the case -- also a former military officer by the name of Oliver North -- has been busily and profitably burnishing his involvement in the affair .
example.arg: his co-defendant in the case -- also a former military officer by the name of Oliver North --
